channel.title: CoinSpice Milk
channel.itunes:subtitle: subtitle
channel.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
channel.itunes:summary: MILK, soothing crypto's burn, is a podcast hosted by C. Edward Kelso of CoinSpice, a feisty and fun crypto news organization. Listen for the very best in spicy cryptocurrency news, controversies, and guests.
channel.description: MILK, soothing crypto's burn, is a podcast hosted by C. Edward Kelso of CoinSpice, a feisty and fun crypto news organization. Listen for the very best in spicy cryptocurrency news, controversies, and guests.

item.itunes:title: Hash War Surprise: New Exchange Voltaire Discusses Implications for BCH Future
item.title: Hash War Surprise: New Exchange Voltaire Discusses Implications for BCH Future
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Founder and CEO Semyon Germanovich, and Head of Growth Jamahl McMurran, both from the new BCH base pair exchange Voltaire.cash join C. Edward Kelso for another important episode of Milk, CoinSpice.io 's flagship podcast. They're the future of the space, and they have a lot to say about the contentious fork turned hash war. Don't miss this.
item.description: Founder and CEO Semyon Germanovich, and Head of Growth Jamahl McMurran, both from the new BCH base pair exchange Voltaire.cash join C. Edward Kelso for another important episode of Milk, CoinSpice.io 's flagship podcast. They're the future of the space, and they have a lot to say about the contentious fork turned hash war. Don't miss this.

Don't miss this.

item.itunes:title: Bitcoin Fork Terror! Jeffrey Tucker Adds Calm with a Touch of Anarchy
item.title: Bitcoin Fork Terror! Jeffrey Tucker Adds Calm with a Touch of Anarchy
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Just hours from the Bitcoin Cash Hard Fork, and everyone seems terrified about this new era the ecosystem is entering: hash wars, etc. Jeffrey Tucker, longtime crypto philosopher and economist, evangelist, respected voice in the space, joins C. Edward Kelso for a special edition of Milk, CoinSpice.io 's flagship podcast. Listen, and get calm.
item.description: Just hours from the Bitcoin Cash Hard Fork, and everyone seems terrified about this new era the ecosystem is entering: hash wars, etc. Jeffrey Tucker, longtime crypto philosopher and economist, evangelist, respected voice in the space, joins C. Edward Kelso for a special edition of Milk, CoinSpice.io 's flagship podcast. Listen, and get calm.
item.content:encoded: Just hours from the Bitcoin Cash Hard Fork, and everyone seems terrified about this new era the ecosystem is entering: hash wars, etc. Jeffrey Tucker, longtime crypto philosopher and economist, evangelist, respected voice in the space, joins C. Edward Kelso for a special edition of Milk, CoinSpice.io 's flagship podcast. Listen, and get calm.

item.itunes:title: Bitcoin Cash Contentious Hard Fork, Wormhole: Gabriel Cardona Speaks
item.title: Bitcoin Cash Contentious Hard Fork, Wormhole: Gabriel Cardona Speaks
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: The Bitcoin Cash (BCH) tribe, as genius developer Gabriel Cardona likes to term the crypto subculture, is at a turning point. He graciously gave a ton of his time from Bitcoin.com offices in Tokyo, Japan to explain the landscape as he sees it, his personal background, Bitbox, Wormhole, tokenization, and the future of one of the world's most popular cryptocurrencies.
item.description: The Bitcoin Cash (BCH) tribe, as genius developer Gabriel Cardona likes to term the crypto subculture, is at a turning point. He graciously gave a ton of his time from Bitcoin.com offices in Tokyo, Japan to explain the landscape as he sees it, his personal background, Bitbox, Wormhole, tokenization, and the future of one of the world's most popular cryptocurrencies.

He graciously gave a ton of his time from Bitcoin.com offices in Tokyo, Japan to explain the landscape as he sees it, his personal background, Bitbox, Wormhole, tokenization, and the future of one of the world's most popular cryptocurrencies.

item.itunes:title: China Divided on BCH Fork, Bitcoin Mining Booming
item.title: China Divided on BCH Fork, Bitcoin Mining Booming
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Journalist, crypto expert Cindy Wang joins C. Edward Kelso for a very interesting episode of MILK. She is not only a gadfly who knows all the most important cryptocurrency players in China, she lives behind the Red Wall, and she is also a rebel. She discusses the upcoming Bitcoin Cash (BCH) fork and why she's worried, and how she deals with family and government pressure to stop working in crypto.
item.description: Journalist, crypto expert Cindy Wang joins C. Edward Kelso for a very interesting episode of MILK. item.content:encoded: Journalist, crypto expert Cindy Wang joins C. Edward Kelso for a very interesting episode of MILK. She is not only a gadfly who knows all the most important cryptocurrency players in China, she lives behind the Red Wall, and she is also a rebel. She discusses the upcoming Bitcoin Cash (BCH) fork and why she's worried, and how she deals with family and government pressure to stop working in crypto.

item.itunes:title: Hyperbitcoinization Hijacked and Twisted, Explains Daniel Krawisz
item.title: Hyperbitcoinization Hijacked and Twisted, Explains Daniel Krawisz
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Hyperbitcoinization, the concept invented by Daniel Krawisz, was ultimately perverted and changed by BTC cultists. In part 2 of a 4 part series, the Emperor of Bitcoin returns to set the record straight. It's a part of crypto history you're not going to want to miss. All rise!
item.description: Hyperbitcoinization, the concept invented by Daniel Krawisz, was ultimately perverted and changed by BTC cultists. In part 2 of a 4 part series, the Emperor of Bitcoin returns to set the record straight. It's a part of crypto history you're not going to want to miss. All rise!

In part 2 of a 4 part series, the Emperor of Bitcoin returns to set the record straight. It's a part of crypto history you're not going to want to miss. All rise!

item.itunes:title: No One Understands Bitcoin: CRYPTO WEEK IN REVIEW Oct 27 2018
item.title: No One Understands Bitcoin: CRYPTO WEEK IN REVIEW Oct 27 2018
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: CRYPTO WEEK IN REVIEW for October 27 2018 from CoinSpice.io ... this week, host C. Edward Kelso examines why no one understands Bitcoin, markets calming, China easing up on crypto, Binance in Singapore, Bitfury's IPO, Elon Musk, and more.
item.description: CRYPTO WEEK IN REVIEW for October 27 2018 from CoinSpice.io ... this week, host C. Edward Kelso examines why no one understands Bitcoin, markets calming, China easing up on crypto, Binance in Singapore, Bitfury's IPO, Elon Musk, and more.
item.content:encoded: CRYPTO WEEK IN REVIEW for October 27 2018 from CoinSpice.io ... this week, host C. Edward Kelso examines why no one understands Bitcoin, markets calming, China easing up on crypto, Binance in Singapore, Bitfury's IPO, Elon Musk, and more.

item.itunes:title: Facebook, Twitter Purge Indy Media Accounts with 2 Million Followers
item.title: Facebook, Twitter Purge Indy Media Accounts with 2 Million Followers
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: On October 11, 2018, founder and Editor-in-Chief Nick Bernabe awoke to find five years of work and 2 million followers was purged, ghosted by Facebook and, later, Twitter. He joins C. Edward Kelso to give exclusive insight, making for a horrifying, maddening, and ultimately inspirational underdog story. Do not miss this.
item.description: On October 11, 2018, founder and Editor-in-Chief Nick Bernabe awoke to find five years of work and 2 million followers was purged, ghosted by Facebook and, later, Twitter. He joins C. Edward Kelso to give exclusive insight, making for a horrifying, maddening, and ultimately inspirational underdog story. Do not miss this.
item.content:encoded: On October 11, 2018, founder and Editor-in-Chief Nick Bernabe awoke to find five years of work and 2 million followers was purged, ghosted by Facebook and, later, Twitter. He joins C. Edward Kelso to give exclusive insight, making for a horrifying, maddening, and ultimately inspirational underdog story. Do not miss this.

item.itunes:title: Bitcoin's Satoshi Nakamoto White Paper Turns 10 Years Old
item.title: Bitcoin's Satoshi Nakamoto White Paper Turns 10 Years Old
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Happy anniversary, baby! The 31st of October of this year marks the tenth anniversary of the Bitcoin White Paper. CoinSpice gets views from four considerate figures in the space: Bitcoin's Emperor Daniel Krawisz, Derek Magill from tryPathly.com and the Nakamoto Studies Institute, founder and Editor-in-Chief of The Anti-Media, Nick Bernabe, and Vin Armani from CoinText and Countermarkets share their insights on what 10 years means, and what we might expect in the future.

item.content:encoded: Happy anniversary, baby! The 31st of October of this year marks the tenth anniversary of the Bitcoin White Paper. item.itunes:title: Derek Magill: Ayn Rand Would've Loved Crypto
item.title: Derek Magill: Ayn Rand Would've Loved Crypto
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Derek Magill of tryPathly.com and the Nakamoto Studies Institute joins C. Edward Kelso to muse about their shared admiration for novelist and philosopher Ayn Rand, and how she would've loved crypto ... and probably would've ended up in Tokyo working with Roger Ver to promote Bitcoin Cash.
item.description: Derek Magill of tryPathly.com and the Nakamoto Studies Institute joins C. Edward Kelso to muse about their shared admiration for novelist and philosopher Ayn Rand, and how she would've loved crypto ... and probably would've ended up in Tokyo working with Roger Ver to promote Bitcoin Cash.

Edward Kelso to muse about their shared admiration for novelist and philosopher Ayn Rand, and how she would've loved crypto ... and probably would've ended up in Tokyo working with Roger Ver to promote Bitcoin Cash.

item.itunes:title: Bitcoin Emperor: BTC Sucks, Only Stupid People Fall for That
item.title: Bitcoin Emperor: BTC Sucks, Only Stupid People Fall for That
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Bitcoin Emperor Daniel Krawisz is on fire in this episode of Milk, Soothing Crypto's Burn, flagship podcast for CoinSpice. Krawisz (pronounced Cray-Wits) describes his transition into supporting Bitcoin Cash (BCH), which he found a more vibrant, creative community after he was chastised by BTC cult members for even discussing BCH.

Krawisz (pronounced Cray-Wits) describes his transition into supporting Bitcoin Cash (BCH), which he found a more vibrant, creative community after he was chastised by BTC cult members for even discussing BCH.

Krawisz (pronounced Cray-Wits) describes his transition into supporting Bitcoin Cash (BCH), which he found a more vibrant, creative community after he was chastised by BTC cult members for even discussing BCH.

item.itunes:title: Vin Armani: I Know Satoshi Nakamoto's True Identity
item.title: Vin Armani: I Know Satoshi Nakamoto's True Identity
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Vin Armani of CoinText, Countermarkets, and the Showtime reality series Gigolos knows Satoshi Nakamoto's true identity. He discusses his research in-depth, and opens up about the importance of his groundbreaking platform CoinText to allow peer-to-peer digital cash to take over the world. Don't miss this episode.
